00041 /* QK extended context save/restore */
00042 
00051 #define QK_EXT_SAVE(act_)      FPU_save((FPU_context *)(act_)->thread)
00052 
00061 #define QK_EXT_RESTORE(act_)   FPU_restore((FPU_context *)(act_)->thread)
00062 
00063 typedef union FPU_contextTag {
00064     uint32_t align;
00065     uint8_t  fpu[108];               /* the x87 FPU context takes 108-bytes */
00066 } FPU_context;
00067 void FPU_save(FPU_context *ctx);                     /* defined in assembly */
00068 void FPU_restore(FPU_context *ctx);                  /* defined in assembly */
00069

00071 /* Thread-Local-Storage switching */
00072 
00082 #define QK_TLS(act_)        \
00083     _impure_ptr = (struct _reent *)(act_)->thread
00084 
00085 /* fake struct _reent and _impure_ptr elements of Newlib... */
00086 struct _reent {
00087     int foo[32];
00088 };
00089 extern struct _reent *_impure_ptr;

00091 /****************************************************************************/
00092 /* QK interrupt entry and exit */
00093 
00102 #define QK_ISR_ENTRY() do { \
00103     ++QK_intNest_; \
00104     QF_QS_ISR_ENTRY(QK_intNest_, QK_currPrio_); \
00105 } while (0)
00106 
00107 
00116 #define QK_ISR_EXIT() do { \
00117     send End-Of-Interrupt instruction to the Interrupt Controller; \
00118     QF_QS_ISR_EXIT(QK_intNest_, QK_currPrio_); \
00119     --QK_intNest_; \
00120     if (QK_intNest_ == (uint8_t)0) { \
00121         QK_scheduleExt_(); \
00122     } \
00123 } while (0)
00124
